[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Consolidated Profit and Loss Statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of -67,376,000 reported in the network role http://faccag.com/xbrl/2021/roles/ConsolidatedStatementOfComprehensiveIncome should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of -67,454,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://faccag.com/xbrl/2021/roles/ConsolidatedStatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/52990021YEMY298JY727/2021-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/faccag-2021-12-31-en.zip/faccag-2021-12-31-en/reports/faccag-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 9236
